items.sentence: Do you know how long Tom has been waiting for you?
Can I stay in Australia for a couple of more days?
Tom thought Mary was going to tell him what to do.
It seems that something\'s wrong with my computer.
Something must\'ve happened to change Tom\'s mind.
Tom won\'t let anyone else come near the barbecue.
Tom wants to rent our farm for the next few years.
Tom was afraid of what might happen to his family.
Do you know why Tom and Mary aren\'t here anymore?
We went swimming in the river yesterday afternoon.
